text:
MongoDB -- | Engineers & Product Designers | New York, NY (ONSITE) | Base + Pre-IPO Stock Options

We are currently looking for: - Full Stack Engineer, Developer Tools - Software Engineer, Testing Infrastructure - Technical Services Engineer - Senior Product Designer - Product Designer, Internal Tools

Any interest please reach out to me at justine.dilworth@mongodb.com or apply here: https://www.mongodb.com/careers/departments/engineering
